timeline.bodyText: @victornoel can we use InMemoryStorage for testing? I think it has more sense for fake implementation here and it doesn't depend on FS resources

+     * Fake {@link Settings} using a file storage.
+     *
+     * @since 0.2

+    final class Fake implements Settings {
+
+        /**
+         * Storage path.

+        private final Path storage;
+
+        /**
+         * Vertx.
+         */
+        private final Vertx vertx;

+            this.vertx = vertx;
+        }
+
